official_title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the Secretaryof the Interior conduct a study to determine whether or not there should be an administrative appeal process to review decisions regarding the denying or revoking of access permits to units of the National Wildlife Refuge System.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the Secretary of the Interior should conduct a study to determine whether or not there should be an administrative appeals process to review decisions by the U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service denying or revoking permits which allow non-employees to transit a wildlife refuge.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the Secretaryof the Interior conduct a study to determine whether or not there should be an administrative appeal process to review decisions regarding the denying or revoking of access permits to units of the National Wildlife Refuge System.
